Name: sotas/时空幽灵
About the game: This game is composed of several different game spaces. Players get resources (such as gold coins) through the game, and go to different game spaces through shuttles. Different games have different identities, different game scenes and enemies. For example, in the beginning of the game space, the player is a warrior. When the warrior dies, he will become a ghost. The ghost will attach to the enemy's body, and the ability and resources of the hood warrior will continue to play
